title: Scientist who helped discover Omicron variant warns of its potential: "This is probably the most mutated virus we'd ever seen"
content:
1. Scientist who helped discover Omicron variant warns of its potential: "This is probably the most mutated virus we'd ever seen"  CBS News
  2. As Omicron variant cases spread, countries rush to impose travel bans: Live updates  CNN
  3. Omicron may cause milder symptoms. But experts aren’t breathing a sigh of relief yet.  NBC News
  4. Singapore says two travellers to Sydney with Omicron transited at Changi  Reuters
  5. New coronavirus strain causes countries to tighten borders  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Scientist who helped discover Omicron variant warns of its potential: "This is probably the most mutated virus we'd ever seen"  CBS News
As Omicron variant cases spread, countries rush to impose travel bans: Live updates  CNN
Omicron may cause milder symptoms. But experts aren’t breathing a sigh of relief yet.  NBC News
Singapore says two travellers to Sydney with Omicron transited at Changi  Reuters
New coronavirus strain causes countries to tighten borders  The Washington Post
View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: オミクロン・バリアントの発見に貢献した科学者がその可能性を警告。"これは今まで見た中で最も変異したウイルスだろう"
帮助发现欧米茄变体的科学家对其潜力发出警告。"这可能是我们见过的变异最大的病毒"
幫助發現歐米茄變體的科學家對其潛力發出警告。"這可能是我們見過的變異最大的病毒"
